thread.title: Phillauri’s New Song, "What's Up", Is So Groovy You Will Dance To It All Day
thread.title_full: Phillauri’s New Song, "What's Up", Is So Groovy You Will Dance To It All Day

title: Phillauri’s New Song, "What's Up", Is So Groovy You Will Dance To It All Day
text:
facebook 124 SHARES 
Anushka Sharma's upcoming movie, Phillauri , releases on March 24 and, ever since the hilarious trailer came out, we just couldn't wait for more. Today, a new song, called What's Up, was released. The song is performed by none other than the king of groove, Mika Singh accompanied by the sweet voice of Jasleen Royal. Mika's yellow and red scooter, and the visual effects shown are quite funny too! 
And as soon as Mika says What's Up, you will want to get up and dance. Totally NSFW, though! Take a look.
